languages.text:
There are three copies of this shield.
The wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Steel Triad:
-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>
languages.original_text:
Этот щит существует в 3 экземплярах.
Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} в зависимости от числа союзников на соседних клетках с такими же щитами.
-<indent=5%>1 союзник: +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 союзника: {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Мастер боя{/g}, +10% к блоку, −30% к получаемому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text: There are three copies of this shield. The wielder gains bonuses based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Scales of the Great Serpent: -1 ally: +2 deflection, +10% block -2 allies: the Combat Master talent, +10% block, area attack damage suffered is reduced by −30%

languages.text:
Bu kalkanın üç nüshası bulunur.
Kullanan kişi, Çelik Üçlü kullanan bitişikteki dost birimlerin sayısına göre {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} kazanır:
-<indent=5%>1 dost birim: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}, +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 dost birim: {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Çatışma Ustası{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerisi{/g}, +%10 bloklama, maruz kalınan {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} %30 azalır</indent>
languages.original_text:
There are three copies of this shield.

-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

languages.text:
Existen tres copias de este escudo.
El portador gana {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} en función del número de aliados adyacentes que empuñen una tríada de acero:
-<indent=5%>1 aliado: +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 aliados: el {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maestría del combate{/g}, +10 % de bloqueo y una reducción de −30 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} sufrido por {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
There are three copies of this shield.

-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Existen tres copias de este escudo.
El portador gana bonificaciones en función del número de aliados adyacentes que empuñen una tríada de acero:
-<indent=5%>1 aliado: +2 de desvío, +10 % de bloqueo</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 aliados: el talento {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maestría del combate{/g}, +10 % de bloqueo y una reducción de −30 % al daño sufrido por ataques de área</indent>

languages.text:
这种盾牌共有三面。
装备者会根据所有使用三重钢盾的邻近盟友数量获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果：
- <indent=5%>1名盟友：+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，+10%{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>2名盟友：获得{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}战斗大师{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，+10%格挡，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低30%</indent>
languages.original_text:
There are three copies of this shield.
The wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Steel Triad:
-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

traits.locale_text:
这种盾牌共有三面。
装备者会根据所有使用三重钢盾的邻近盟友数量获得加成效果：
- <indent=5%>1名盟友：+2偏转，+10%格挡</indent>
- <indent=5%>2名盟友：获得{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}战斗大师{/g}天赋，+10%格挡，承受的范围攻击伤害降低30%</indent>

这种盾牌共有三面。

- <indent=5%>2名盟友：获得{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}战斗大师{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，+10%格挡，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低30%</indent>

languages.text:
Il s'agit d'un triple bouclier.
L'utilisateur gagne des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui dépendent du nombre d'alliés adjacents utilisant Triade d'acier :
-<indent=5%>1 allié : +2 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}, +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocage{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 alliés : {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maître du combat{/g}, +10 % de Blocage, réduction de −30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone{/g} subis</indent>
languages.original_text:
There are three copies of this shield.
The wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Steel Triad:
-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Il s'agit d'un triple bouclier.
L'utilisateur gagne des bonus qui dépendent du nombre d'alliés adjacents utilisant Triade d'acier :
-<indent=5%>1 allié : +2 à la Déflexion, +10 % de Blocage</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 alliés : talent {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maître du combat{/g}, +10 % de Blocage, réduction de −30 % des dégâts de zone subis</indent>

-<indent=5%>2 alliés : {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maître du combat{/g}, +10 % de Blocage, réduction de −30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone{/g} subis</indent>

languages.text:
このシールドのコピーが3つある。
使用者は、隣接するスチールトライアドを使用した味方の数に基づいて{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。
-<indent=5%>味方1体：{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}+2、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}+10%</indent>-<indent=5%>味方2体：{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}戦闘の達人{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}、ブロック+10%、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が-30%される</indent>
languages.original_text:
There are three copies of this shield.
The wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Steel Triad:
-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

traits.locale_text:
このシールドのコピーが3つある。
使用者は、隣接するスチールトライアドを使用した味方の数に基づいてボーナスを獲得する。
-<indent=5%>味方1体：ディフレクション+2、ブロック+10%</indent>-<indent=5%>味方2体：{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}戦闘の達人{/g}の能力、ブロック+10%、エリアアタックダメージが-30%される</indent>

languages.text:
Es gibt drei Kopien dieses Schildes.
Der Träger erhält {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} basierend auf der Zahl der Verbündeten mit Stahltriade auf angrenzenden Feldern:
-<indent=5%>1 Verbündeter: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 Verbündete: das {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Kampfmeister{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g}, +10 % Blocken und erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenschaden{/g} um -30 % reduziert{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}</indent>
